title: Natural Health Chiropractic and Acupuncture
description: Natural Health Chiropractic and Acupuncture in Ankeny, Iowa combines unique state of the art chiropractic techniques with both needle and needle-less forms of acupuncture that has proven to get excellent results with a wide range of conditions for your entire family!
cleaned_text: Thank you for all the support throughout the years. We are honored to be able to serve the community and humbled to be voted Ankeny's Best for 2021, 2022 and 2023! — Dr. Jennifer "The power that made the body is the power that heals the body." — B.J. Palmer, D.C Dream it. After receiving extensive training in prenatal and pediatric care through the ICPA (International Chiropractic Pediatrics Association), one of Dr. Jennifer's greatest passions is to help women and children. Build it. Dr. Jennifer always wanted to be a chiropractor since sixth grade when doing an exploratory project "what do you want to be when you grow up?" After shadowing professionals in the community, she just knew she wanted to serve and help people through chiropractic care. Grow it. In addition to chiropractic, Dr. Jennifer has over 500 hours of acupuncture experience and has trained under many teachers world-wide, including Dr. Richard Yennie, a pioneer of Chiropractic Acupuncture. She even had the opportunity to study in China. "Dr. Jennifer and her team have nurtured me back to health, physically and emotionally. After complications from multiple surgeries, I was in constant pain. Physical therapy made it worse. Dr. Jennifer found a pinched nerve and I began to heal. I've never felt so loved and cared for by a doctor and her team. They are amazing!" - Jean B.
